vendor_name: The William Inglis Hotel - MGallery by Sofitel
title: Boutique MGallery by Sofitel Luxury Overlooking Warwick Farm Racecourse
description: From the breathtaking rooftop infinity pool overlooking 300 acres of the Warwick Farm Racecourse to the world-class horse portraits gracing the walls of the William Inglis -MGallery by Sofitel, you’ll feel like a racing VIP with a stay at this equine-themed hotel. Created by MGallery by Sofitel, this luxurious retreat by the green is Sydney’s iconic destination for events, celebrating racing history and the thoroughbred industry. It’s a sure bet with daily buffet breakfast at the Newmarket Room, guaranteed 12pm late checkout, a bottle of welcome wine to cheers to the breathtaking Warwick Farm Racecourse views from your Superior King Room and two A$25 spa credits to be put towards two separate treatments.
offer_address: 155 Gov Macquarie Dr, Warwick Farm NSW 2170

title: Modern Western Sydney Escape Near Water Park and Parklands
description: Take the family across acres of rich equestrian heritage and plenty of charm at Holiday Inn Warwick Farm, an IHG Hotel, ideally located for adventures in Western Sydney. Visit the animals at Sydney Zoo, clamber over the huge outdoor playground at Western Sydney Parklands or scream down Whirlwind, the 206m-long slide at Raging Waters Sydney. Get ready for the day with breakfast at Norton's Restaurant and finish the day with local delicacies at The Warwick Bar, Bistro & Grill.
location_description: Holiday Inn Warwick Farm, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 355 Hume Highway, Warwick Farm 2170, New South Wales, Australia
